text:
Feastly | Web Developer (Frontend or Backend, Python/Django and AngularJS) | San Francisco or REMOTE (Preferably based on Argentina) | Full Time

Feastly is a platform that connects cooks with adventurous diners in cooks' homes or venues, aiming to lower barriers for entry into the food space. We have successful operations in multiple cities across the US.

We're looking for a senior frontend engineer, preferably with a background in AngularJS, as well as a backend engineer versed in Python/Django, ideally with knowledge of PostgresSQL and AWS.

This is a very small, empowered, and highly productive team and tech stack. The product is great, everyone is focused and the working environment is very amenable.

Our website is https://www.eafeastly.com/

Send your CV to andres@eatfeastly.com
